name: マリシアス
summary: Malicious (マリシアス Marishiasu?) is a download-only 3D action game developed and published by Alvion for the PlayStation 3[1] and the PlayStation Vita. Malicious was released on October 27, 2010 and is available to download from PlayStation Store in Japan.[2] Because of the game's critical success,[3] an enhanced port of the game was announced for the PlayStation Vita.[4] The port remains a download-exclusive.
info:
